title: The new PS5 is BETTER ðŸ˜¬
description: The PS5 1200 model is surprisingly different Subscribe to @PSReady and @Denki!     Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter titles: 0:00 The New PS5 1200 Model 0:48 What's new? 2:23 The PS5 price hike 3:12 Is it lighter? 3:50 Power, Noise and Temps 6:00 PS5 Teardown 8:20 Inside the New PS5

Maybe it's time for you to subscribe and ring-a-ling the ding-a-ling bell. 'Cause I don't think we're done with the new PS5 just yet.
